message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $11,000. I believe this is a fair offer considering the benefits it will bring you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is significantly higher than your offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway - how about $10,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $9,500. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle this time.
